parse.title: Ministry of Primary and Mass Education

text.*:
People's Republic of Bangladesh
Ministry of Primary and Mass Education
Bengali: প্রাথমিক ও গণশিক্ষা মন্ত্রণালয়
(Prāthamika ō gaṇaśikṣā mantraṇālaẏa)
Government Seal of Bangladesh
Agency overview
Formed 1972
Jurisdiction Government of Bangladesh
Headquarters Ministry of Primary and Mass Education
Bangladesh Secretariat, Dhaka-1000
Agency executive
  • Mostafizur Rahman, Minister for Primary and Mass Education
Website Ministry of Primary and Mass Education

The Ministry of Primary and Mass Education (Bengali: প্রাথমিক ও গণশিক্ষা মন্ত্রণালয়) (abbreviated as MoPME) is the ministry responsible for Primary (Class I-VIII) [1][2] and Mass (literacy) education in Bangladesh. Secondary, vocational and tertiary educations is the responsibility of the Ministry of Education (Bangladesh) (MoED).

Contents

  • 1 Organisation
  • 2 Ministers
  • 3 References
  • 4 External links

Organisation[edit]

  • Bureau of Non-Formal Education
  • The National Academy for Primary Education
  • Directorate of Primary Education

Ministers[edit]

  • Current Minister : Mostafizur Rahman

References[edit]

  1. ^ "Primary education to be up to class VIII". Prothom Alo. 2016-05-18. Retrieved 2016-05-31. 
  2. ^ "Primary education now up to class VIII". The Daily Star. 2016-05-18. Retrieved 2016-05-31.
